LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.label: backup support
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.description: Send a reinforcement request to an automated industrial facility located in orbit, and the central command will automatically deduct the reinforcement quota based on the identification code on the transceiver.
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.label: backup support
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.description: Send a reinforcement request to an automated industrial facility located in orbit, and the central command will automatically deduct the reinforcement quota based on the identification code on the transceiver.
